author: ralexstokes
content: the intent of the EIP at the moment is that it is for the current block

author: ralexstokes
content: i can update the EIP to make this clear

author: ralexstokes
content: although it sounds like we favor using the parent's value instead?

author: marioevz
content: Tests at the moment assume current block, what would be the benefit of using parent's value?

author: ralexstokes
content: <@341574016160497665> do you want to argue for parent?

author: ralexstokes
content: i would lean towards keeping it as-is unless there is a compelling reason to change

author: ralexstokes
content: hmm ok i think it should be parent

author: ralexstokes
content: the other numbers it is compared against work in terms of parent

author: ralexstokes
content: it also makes the computation self-contained, which was simon's point above

author: ralexstokes
content: and because of how it is used (against parent values) it side-steps any questions around discontinuities in the fee market
